original_title: Persona Super Live P-Sound WISH 2022 Day 1
overview: PERSONA SUPER LIVE P-SOUND WISH 2022 ～交差する旅路～ (lit. Crossing Journey) was a two-day concert held on October 8th-9th, 2022. It featured songs from Persona, Persona 2 Innocent Sin, Eternal Punishment, Persona 3, Portable, The Movie, Dancing in Moonlight, Persona 4, Arena, Arena Ultimax, Dancing All Night, Persona 4 The Animation, Persona 4 The Golden Animation, Persona 5, Royal, Strikers, Dancing in Starlight, Persona 5 The Animation and Persona Q2: New Cinema Labrynth. Day 1 contains the songs performed on October 8th 2022
title: Persona Super Live P-Sound WISH 2022 Day 1
